tasks.title: Get OpenAI API Key for Command Center
tasks.description: Go to platform.openai.com/api-keys, create a key, add it to Command Center chat settings. Enables GPT-4o and GPT-4 Turbo for agents.

tasks.title: Rebuild Kanban board
tasks.description: File-based JSON storage, Geeves can read/write

tasks.title: Build Geeves Command Center
tasks.description: Unified dashboard for all Geeves operations - status, kanban, activity, docs, content intel, analytics

tasks.title: Skool → GHL Middleware
tasks.description: Connect Skool events to GHL webhooks via Make/n8n. Workflows ready, need middleware.

tasks.title: Daily Metrics Automation
tasks.description: Pull Skool, GHL, Meta Ads, Stripe metrics → automated dashboard

tasks.title: Close Dave Morrow → VIP
tasks.description: Hot lead, understands the math, ready for 90-day offer with 1:1 session

tasks.title: Instagram Strategy Launch
tasks.description: Bio rewrite, unfollow sprints, Week 1 content filmed/scheduled

tasks.title: Set up Specialized Agents
tasks.description: Create Copy, Close Bot, Workshop, Content agents with specialized prompts and knowledge

tasks.title: Implement Token Saving Strategy
tasks.description: Implemented: 1) Daily Brief cron → Sonnet 4 (was Opus), 2) Weekly Review cron → Sonnet 4 (was Opus), 3) Gabby cron already on Sonnet. Heartbeat still runs on main session Opus but fires only every 30min. Estimated savings: $15-20/day.

tasks.title: Client Progress Monitoring
tasks.description: Build system to track who's stuck, who needs attention

tasks.title: YouTube API Setup
tasks.description: Get API key from Google Cloud Console, configure channel tracking

tasks.title: Command Center as Client Product
tasks.description: Package dashboard for clients: template version, setup guide, white-label option. Potential offers: $297 template, $2-5K done-with-you, $97-297/mo hosted SaaS, $5-10K white-label license.

tasks.title: Build n8n Content Intelligence Scraper
tasks.description: Daily TikTok/IG competitor scrape + AI analysis pipeline. Part 1: Scrape profiles, dedupe, store in Supabase. Part 2: Download video → Gemini visual analysis (hooks, format) → transcript pull → GPT text extraction (hook framework, structure, CTA) → OpenAI embeddings for semantic search. Based on Noe Varner Creator OS. Docs: specs/n8n-content-analyzer-part2.md. Need: ScrapeCreators API key, competitor handles (5-10), n8n instance, OpenAI key, Gemini key.
